sn35.143:3.1: 143. Bāhirāniccahetusutta
sn35.143:4.2: Yopi hetu, yopi paccayo rūpānaṃ uppādāya, sopi anicco.
sn35.143:4.3: Aniccasambhūtā, bhikkhave, rūpā kuto niccā bhavissanti.
sn35.143:4.9: Yopi hetu, yopi paccayo dhammānaṃ uppādāya, sopi anicco.
sn35.143:4.10: Aniccasambhūtā, bhikkhave, dhammā kuto niccā bhavissanti.
